is_adult or Slingshot or Sticks or

exits.Deku Tree 2F Passage:
here(has_fire_source or (can_press_floor_switch and (can_use(Sticks) or can_use(Bow))))
				and transition('Deku Tree T01', True)
exits.Deku Tree 3F Room:
here(can_press_floor_switch or has_fire_source)
				and transition('Deku Tree T07', True)

locations.Deku Baba Nuts:
is_adult or Slingshot or Sticks or

exits.Deku Tree 2F Room:
transition('Deku Tree T06',
                here(can_use(Slingshot) or can_use(Bow))
				or 'Deku Tree MQ Room 01 T06 Unbar')

locations.Deku Tree MQ GS Compass Room:
(can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Boomerang)) and
                (has_bombchus or (Bombs and (here(is_adult) or can_play(Song_of_Time))))

locations.Deku Tree MQ Basement Chest: can_climb(60) and can_press_floor_switch and (has_fire_source_with_torch or can_use(Bow))

can_climb(60) and
                (at('Deku Tree Basement River Room Ledge', True)
                    or here(logic_deku_b1_skip or can_climb(85)))
